original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gsan ma thag tu 'jam dpal la sogs pas 'di skad gsol te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gsan ma thag tu 'jam dpal la sogs pas 'di skad gsol te /
translated: As soon as they heard the speech of the Tathagatas, Manjusri and the others said this:

original: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa la gsol ba gdab pa 'jam dpal nye bar gzung ba ni shes rab kyi rang bzhin yin pas rno ba nyid bstan pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa la gsol ba gdab pa 'jam dpal nye bar gzung ba ni shes rab kyi rang bzhin yin pas rno ba nyid bstan pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Bhagavat and so forth. The supplication is Manjusri because he is the nature of wisdom, and thus he is taught to be sharp.

original: bcom ldan 'das ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Bhagavat is Akshobhya and so forth.

original: mi'i sgra ni dgag pa la'o//
analyzed: mi'i sgra ni dgag pa la'o//
translated: Human is a negation.

original: gsung rdo rje'i tshig ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'i bstan pa'i gsung de ltar phyin ci log ba ni bden pa ma yin par /
analyzed: gsung rdo rje'i tshig ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'i bstan pa'i gsung de ltar phyin ci log ba ni bden pa ma yin par /
translated: Speech of the vajra is the speech of the teaching of Great Vajradhara. Thus is the opposite of the untrue.

original: mi rtag tu gsol ba ni rtag par ma mdzad cig ces pa ste /
analyzed: mi rtag tu gsol ba ni rtag par ma mdzad cig ces pa ste /
translated: Do not make it permanent means do not make it impermanent.

original: gang zhig lus la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid med pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: gang zhig lus la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid med pa zhes bya'o //
translated: That which is without the characteristics of body and so forth is what is said.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na pa ni gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni sngar bshad pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs te /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na pa ni gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni sngar bshad pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs te /
translated: Why is that? is because all the Tathagatas are the assembly of Tathagatas explained above.

original: de nyid kyi gang zhig rdo rje dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid ni ye shes lnga ste /
analyzed: de nyid kyi gang zhig rdo rje dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid ni ye shes lnga ste /
translated: The nature of that vajra realm is the five pristine consciousnesses.

original: de rnams kyi spyod pa ni mngon du byed pa ste /
analyzed: de rnams kyi spyod pa ni mngon du byed pa ste /
translated: Their conduct is the actualization of those.

original: de la rjes su 'gro ba ni zhugs pa dang / 'ong ba ni de las bzhengs shing sems can gyi don mdzad pa gang yin pa de ni de bzhin te /
analyzed: de la rjes su 'gro ba ni zhugs pa dang / 'ong ba ni de las bzhengs shing sems can gyi don mdzad pa gang yin pa de ni de bzhin te /
translated: Following that is the engagement, and the coming is the arising from that and the performance of the benefit of sentient beings.

original: rdo rje 'chang chen po re zhig khams gsum pa la phan pa mdzad par rab tu grags pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang chen po re zhig khams gsum pa la phan pa mdzad par rab tu grags pa'o //
translated: That is so, since it is well known that MahƒÅvajradhara benefits the three realms for a while.üîΩWhy is his speech profound?üîΩWhy is it false?

original: de nyid kyi zab pa'i gsung ci'i slad du brdzun du gsung ba'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyi zab pa'i gsung ci'i slad du brdzun du gsung ba'o //
translated: Why is it so?

original: de ci'i slad du zhes pa ni tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po ni sa bcu'i dbang phyug rnams dang / mngon par shes pa thob pa ni lha'i mig la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa rnams te /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhes pa ni tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po ni sa bcu'i dbang phyug rnams dang / mngon par shes pa thob pa ni lha'i mig la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa rnams te /
translated: The gods such as BrahmƒÅ, the lords of the ten stages, and the bodhisattvas who have attained the superknowledges have the qualities of the divine eye, and so on.

original: de dag kyang rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsungs pa'i chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid kyi ngo bo nyid ni dngos po'i rang bzhin mi shes pa ste /
analyzed: de dag kyang rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsungs pa'i chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid kyi ngo bo nyid ni dngos po'i rang bzhin mi shes pa ste /
translated: Moreover, the nature of the reality of all the Dharmas taught by Great Vajradhara is not known by the nature of things.

original: zab pa'i phyir mi rtogs na /
analyzed: zab pa'i phyir mi rtogs na /
translated: If one does not realize it because of its profundity,

original: bdag cag smos ci @263b dgos zhes de bzhin gshegs pa la tshul gyis bstan par byed pa'o //
analyzed: bdag cag smos ci @263b dgos zhes de bzhin gshegs pa la tshul gyis bstan par byed pa'o //
translated: what need is there to mention us?‚Äù

original: de rnams kyang rang gi sems la rnam par rtog pa 'di ltar byed pa ste /
analyzed: de rnams kyang rang gi sems la rnam par rtog pa 'di ltar byed pa ste /
translated: They also think this way in their own minds:

original: rdo rje 'chang chen po 'di de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje lus la sogs pa dang ye shes rnams te /
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang chen po 'di de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje lus la sogs pa dang ye shes rnams te /
translated: ‚ÄúThis Great Vajradhara is all the Tathagatas‚Äô vajra bodies and so forth and their wisdoms.

original: de dag gi de kho na nyid ni don dam pa ste ;
analyzed: de dag gi de kho na nyid ni don dam pa ste ;
translated: Their reality is the ultimate,

original: de nyid yongs su zhes pa ni yang dag par rtogs nas gsang ba'i yi ge ni rdo rje'i tshul gyis chos bstan par mdzad pa'am /
analyzed: de nyid yongs su zhes pa ni yang dag par rtogs nas gsang ba'i yi ge ni rdo rje'i tshul gyis chos bstan par mdzad pa'am /
translated: and having fully realized that, he teaches the Dharma by means of the secret letters, the vajra way.

original: yang na ma rtogs nas mdzad pa ste /
analyzed: yang na ma rtogs nas mdzad pa ste /
translated: Or, if one does not realize it, he does it.

original: de lta bu'i rnam par rtog par byed pa'i tshangs pa la sogs mkhyen nas de rnams rjes su gzung ba'i phyir rdo rje 'chang gis 'od gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin las cig car du bzhengs te /
analyzed: de lta bu'i rnam par rtog par byed pa'i tshangs pa la sogs mkhyen nas de rnams rjes su gzung ba'i phyir rdo rje 'chang gis 'od gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin las cig car du bzhengs te /
translated: Having known such a conceptualizing Brahma and so forth, in order to take care of them, Vajradhara suddenly arose from the concentration of clear light,

original: sgyu ma lta bu'i sku blang bar mdzad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sgyu ma lta bu'i sku blang bar mdzad par 'gyur ro //
translated: and took up the illusory body.

original: zab pa'i don ma rtogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la /
analyzed: zab pa'i don ma rtogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la /
translated: To the bodhisattvas who did not understand the meaning of the profound,

original: mi bskyod pa la sogs pas 'di skad gsungs te /
analyzed: mi bskyod pa la sogs pas 'di skad gsungs te /
translated: Akshobhya and so forth spoke thus:

original: byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba'i bod pa'i tshig go //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba'i bod pa'i tshig go //
translated: The Tibetan word for bodhisattva is byang chub sems dpa.

original: de nyid rgyud kyi rigs pas bskor te /
analyzed: de nyid rgyud kyi rigs pas bskor te /
translated: That very one is surrounded by the reasoning of the tantra.

original: byang chub sems dpa' ni tshangs pa la sogs pa ste mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' ni tshangs pa la sogs pa ste mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa'o //
translated: The bodhisattvas are Brahma and so forth, endowed with the five superknowledges.

original: de rnams smos ci dgos te /
analyzed: de rnams smos ci dgos te /
translated: What need is there to mention them?

original: nyid ni mngon par shes pa drug dang ldan pa yang /
analyzed: nyid ni mngon par shes pa drug dang ldan pa yang /
translated: Even one endowed with the six superknowledges,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin gyi rdo rje 'chang chen po'o//
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin gyi rdo rje 'chang chen po'o//
translated: is the nature of the body, speech, and mind of all the tathagatas, the great Vajradhara.

original: gsang ba'i mi 'gyur ni 'od gsal ba'i de kho na nyid de /
analyzed: gsang ba'i mi 'gyur ni 'od gsal ba'i de kho na nyid de /
translated: The secret unchanging is the reality of clear light.

original: de rnyed pa ni thos nas sku gsung thugs kyi byang chub ni sgyu ma lta bu'i sku yongs su bzung ba dang / 'od gsal ba'i de kho na nyid mi shes ni mngon du byed par ma gyur to //
analyzed: de rnyed pa ni thos nas sku gsung thugs kyi byang chub ni sgyu ma lta bu'i sku yongs su bzung ba dang / 'od gsal ba'i de kho na nyid mi shes ni mngon du byed par ma gyur to //
translated: The attainment of that is the enlightenment of body, speech, and mind, which is the complete assumption of the illusory body, and the realization of the reality of clear light.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na zhes pa ni skye ba med pa'i phyir rdo rje'i rnam par shes pa thams cad rang bzhin gyi tshogs 'gags pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi thams cad stong pa ste /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na zhes pa ni skye ba med pa'i phyir rdo rje'i rnam par shes pa thams cad rang bzhin gyi tshogs 'gags pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi thams cad stong pa ste /
translated: Why is that? Because of non-production, all vajra consciousnesses are the emptiness of everything, which is characterized by the cessation of the collection of natures.

original: de nyid mngon par byang chub ni rim pa gzhan gyis phyag rgya dang / ril por 'dzin pa dang rjes su 'jog pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis thob par 'gyur ba ste /
analyzed: de nyid mngon par byang chub ni rim pa gzhan gyis phyag rgya dang / ril por 'dzin pa dang rjes su 'jog pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis thob par 'gyur ba ste /
translated: That very manifest enlightenment is attained by another process, by the samadhis of the seal, the totalities, and the masteries.

original: ngo bo nyid med pa ni rnam par rtog pa'i bag chags kyi dri ma dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba las 'byung ba'i chos nyid kyis ngo bor grags pa'o //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid med pa ni rnam par rtog pa'i bag chags kyi dri ma dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba las 'byung ba'i chos nyid kyis ngo bor grags pa'o //
translated: The reality free from the stains of conceptual habitual tendencies is renowned as the essence of the dharmata that arises from the non-entity.

original: de lta bu'i chos nyid nges kyis kyang mngon du byed par dka' ba yin na /
analyzed: de lta bu'i chos nyid nges kyis kyang mngon du byed par dka' ba yin na /
translated: If it is difficult to realize the reality of such a Dharma,

original: tshangs pa la sogs pa gzhan rnams lta smos ci dgos zhes dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: tshangs pa la sogs pa gzhan rnams lta smos ci dgos zhes dgongs pa'o //
translated: what need is there to mention other gods such as Brahma?

original: ji skad du /üîΩdbu ma'i lam ni de nyid dang // chos @264a * //
analyzed: ji skad du / dbu ma'i lam ni de nyid dang // chos @264a * //
translated: As it is said:üîΩThe middle path is thatness,

original: rnams bdag med de nyid dang // yang dag mtha' dang de bzhin nyid //
analyzed: rnams bdag med de nyid dang // yang dag mtha' dang de bzhin nyid //
translated: The selflessness of phenomena, the limit of reality, suchness,

original: stong pa nyid kyang de nyid do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang de nyid do //
translated: And also emptiness.

original: mnyam pa nyid dang grol ba nyid //
analyzed: mnyam pa nyid dang grol ba nyid //
translated: It is equality, liberation,

original: rnam par rig tsam de nyid do //
analyzed: rnam par rig tsam de nyid do //
translated: And mere cognition.

original: chos kun nang du 'gro ba'i phyir //
analyzed: chos kun nang du 'gro ba'i phyir //
translated: Because all phenomena enter into it,

original: yun ring ma yin nye ba min //
analyzed: yun ring ma yin nye ba min //
translated: It is not far, nor is it near.

original: de bzhin nyid de rtogs dka'i phyir //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid de rtogs dka'i phyir //
translated: Because suchness is difficult to realize,

original: phra bar gzigs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi //
analyzed: phra bar gzigs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi //
translated: The buddhas, who see the subtle,

original: phra phyir rang gis rig 'gyur te //
analyzed: phra phyir rang gis rig 'gyur te //
translated: See it as subtle.

original: rags pa'i blo can nged rnams kyis //
analyzed: rags pa'i blo can nged rnams kyis //
translated: We, who have coarse minds,

original: rang gnas na yang mthong mi 'gyur //
analyzed: rang gnas na yang mthong mi 'gyur //
translated: Do not see it, even though it is present.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ngo //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ngo //
translated: And so on.

original: chad pa'i lta ba sel ba'i phyir bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: chad pa'i lta ba sel ba'i phyir bshad par bya ste /
translated: In order to eliminate the view of annihilation, it should be explained:

original: byang chub de yang rnyed par mi dka' ste /
analyzed: byang chub de yang rnyed par mi dka' ste /
translated: That enlightenment is not difficult to attain.

original: ci'i phyir rigs kyi bu zhes bya la sogs pa la /
analyzed: ci'i phyir rigs kyi bu zhes bya la sogs pa la /
translated: Why is it called a son of good lineage, etc.?

original: ji srid sems can ni 'gro ba rnams te /
analyzed: ji srid sems can ni 'gro ba rnams te /
translated: As long as there are sentient beings, that is, living beings,

original: de dag sems can gyi khongs su gtogs pa ni rnam pa bzhis bsdu ba ste /
analyzed: de dag sems can gyi khongs su gtogs pa ni rnam pa bzhis bsdu ba ste /
translated: they are included in the category of sentient beings by four kinds of inclusion.

original: de dag thams cad byang chub ni 'od gsal ba'i de kho na nyid dang po nas thob cing gnas par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de dag thams cad byang chub ni 'od gsal ba'i de kho na nyid dang po nas thob cing gnas par 'gyur te /
translated: All of them will attain and abide in enlightenment, that is, the reality of clear light, from the beginning.

original: chos nyid ni rang bzhin gyis grub pas bskyed par bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos nyid ni rang bzhin gyis grub pas bskyed par bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because reality is not something to be generated, since it is established by nature.

original: bskyed par bya ba yin na 'dus byas pa mi rtag pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: bskyed par bya ba yin na 'dus byas pa mi rtag pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: If it were something to be generated, it would be a conditioned phenomenon and therefore impermanent.

original: 'on ci'i phyir sems can rnams grol bar ma gyur zhe na /
analyzed: 'on ci'i phyir sems can rnams grol bar ma gyur zhe na /
translated: But why have sentient beings not been liberated?

original: de ci'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Why is it so, etc.?

original: sku gsung thugs ni de rnams nye bar sdud par byed pa'i rdo rje ye shes ni 'od gsal ba'i de kho na nyid yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir lam dang bla ma'i zhal las thob nas sems de dag sku gsung rdo rje ni rdo rje 'chang chen
analyzed: sku gsung thugs ni de rnams nye bar sdud par byed pa'i rdo rje ye shes ni 'od gsal ba'i de kho na nyid yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir lam dang bla ma'i zhal las thob nas sems de dag sku gsung rdo rje ni rdo rje 'chang chen
translated: The mind of those is the vajra of body, speech, and mind, which is the great Vajradhara.

original: po ste / de'i chos nyid ni don dam pa'i 'od gsal ba nyid thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: po ste / de'i chos nyid ni don dam pa'i 'od gsal ba nyid thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: The reality of that is the ultimate clear light itself, which is obtained.

original: de bas na glo bur ba'i dri ma sel bar bya ba'i phyir lam dang / bla ma rnams la bsnyen bkur bya ba yin te /
analyzed: de bas na glo bur ba'i dri ma sel bar bya ba'i phyir lam dang / bla ma rnams la bsnyen bkur bya ba yin te /
translated: Therefore, in order to remove the adventitious defilements, one should serve the path and the gurus.

original: de kho na nyid thob par bya ba'i phyir ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de kho na nyid thob par bya ba'i phyir ni ma yin no //
translated: But it is not in order to obtain reality.

original: de bas na de kho na nyid ni rnyed par sla ba yin pa dang / rnyed par dka' ba yang ngo //
analyzed: de bas na de kho na nyid ni rnyed par sla ba yin pa dang / rnyed par dka' ba yang ngo //
translated: Therefore, reality is easy to obtain and difficult to obtain.

original: de'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis de kho na nyid mngon du mdzad pa'i phyir cang mi gsung bar gyur te /
analyzed: de'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis de kho na nyid mngon du mdzad pa'i phyir cang mi gsung bar gyur te /

original: mi mkhyen pa la sogs ba gzhan gyis yin no zhes khyed rnams la the tshom ma bskyed cig pa'o //
analyzed: mi mkhyen pa la sogs ba gzhan gyis yin no zhes khyed rnams la the tshom ma bskyed cig pa'o //
translated: Do not generate doubt in yourselves about the other, such as the unknowing.

original: ji skad du /
analyzed: ji skad du /
translated: As it is said:

original: rnal 'byor rig pas rnams kyang ni //
analyzed: rnal 'byor rig pas rnams kyang ni //
translated: Even the yogis and the wise

original: thar par yun ring sems mi bya //üîΩkun brtags ngo bos stong pa yi //üîΩbdag nyid mthong ba thar pa yin //
analyzed: thar par yun ring sems mi bya // kun brtags ngo bos stong pa yi // bdag nyid mthong ba thar pa yin //
translated: do not think of liberation as distant.üîΩSeeing the nature of self,

original: zhes 'byung ngo //
analyzed: zhes 'byung ngo //
translated: which is empty of the imagined nature, is liberation.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dang byang chub @264b sems dpa' rnams kyi drin lan gsan nas don de nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dang byang chub @264b sems dpa' rnams kyi drin lan gsan nas don de nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos /
translated: Having heard the kindness of the Tathagatas and Bodhisattvas, in order to teach that very meaning, the Bhagavat Great Vajradhara said:

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa bka' stsal pa ste /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa bka' stsal pa ste /
translated: Then, etc.

original: rang bzhin dag cing bdag med la //
analyzed: rang bzhin dag cing bdag med la //
translated: Pure by nature, selfless,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: etc.

original: rang bzhin dag pa ni phung po la sogs pa'i chos 'di rnams thams cad stong pa'i rang bzhin dang / gnas med pa ni yongs su brtags pa'i so sor nges ba dang ldan pa'i mtshan ma dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin dag pa ni phung po la sogs pa'i chos 'di rnams thams cad stong pa'i rang bzhin dang / gnas med pa ni yongs su brtags pa'i so sor nges ba dang ldan pa'i mtshan ma dang bral ba'o //
translated: The absence of location is the freedom from signs of the individual determination of thorough examination.

original: de bzhin du gang zhig sangs rgyas kyi chos byang chub kyi phyogs la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du gang zhig sangs rgyas kyi chos byang chub kyi phyogs la sogs pa ste /
translated: In the same way, the Buddha qualities are the factors of enlightenment and so forth.

original: de rnams de dang 'dra ba'o //
analyzed: de rnams de dang 'dra ba'o //

original: 'on byang chub sems dpa' ni 'gro ba'i don ji ltar mdzad ce na /
analyzed: 'on byang chub sems dpa' ni 'gro ba'i don ji ltar mdzad ce na /
translated: But how does the bodhisattva perform the benefit of beings?

original: rtog pa ni sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin te /
analyzed: rtog pa ni sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin te /
translated: Imagination is the illusion-like samadhi.

original: des rdo rje 'ja' tshon dang 'dra ba'i sku blang ba ste /
analyzed: des rdo rje 'ja' tshon dang 'dra ba'i sku blang ba ste /
translated: By that, he takes up the vajra body which is like a rainbow.

original: de las byung ba ni byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba'i don gyi bya ba rnams so //
analyzed: de las byung ba ni byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba'i don gyi bya ba rnams so //

original: de bas na sgyu ma lta bu'i sku la brten te bya ba thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams smra bar byed pa ni brjod pa kun rdzob kyis bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: de bas na sgyu ma lta bu'i sku la brten te bya ba thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams smra bar byed pa ni brjod pa kun rdzob kyis bstan par bya'o //

original: 'od gsal ba la dmigs te rang rig pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'od gsal ba la dmigs te rang rig pa'i phyir /

original: smra ba yin na de rnams brjod du mi nus pa ste /
analyzed: smra ba yin na de rnams brjod du mi nus pa ste /
translated: it is inexpressible,üîΩlike the feelings of pleasure and pain experienced by gods and hell beings,üîΩand like the pleasure of a virgin.

original: lha dang dmyal ba pa rnams kyis bde ba dang sdug bsngal nyams su myong ba'i tshor ba ston pa bzhin dang / bu mo'i dga' ba bzhin du ste rdzogs pa'i rim pa dang / sems rnam par dag pa dang mngon par byang chub pa dang /
analyzed: lha dang dmyal ba pa rnams kyis bde ba dang sdug bsngal nyams su myong ba'i tshor ba ston pa bzhin dang / bu mo'i dga' ba bzhin du ste rdzogs pa'i rim pa dang / sems rnam par dag pa dang mngon par byang chub pa dang /
translated: The stages of completion, the purification of mind, manifest enlightenment,
